name: Block Force
description:
*This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2*

A simple block puzzle game with a twist!  Block force provides chaotic gameplay from you trying to avoid aliens and clear lines at the same time!!  Avoiding block-shaped aliens and take them down with your spaceship while trying to not let your piece fill up to the top of the board!

Controls:

Move Ship / Blocks Left & Right -> Left & Right Arrow Key  /  A & W key

Shoot / Hard Drop -> Space Bar

Rotate Blocks -> Up Arrow Key / W Key

Soft Drop (Increases Block's Fall Speed) -> Down Arrow Key / S Key


Development Team:
